alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Saguache County through 430 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of North Pass, or 27 miles southwest of Decker Burn Scar. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Saguache County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft
